results.result: <form onsubmit="return false" class="ezUser-form"> <fieldset class="ezUser-fieldset"> <input type="text" size="40" onkeypress="ezUser_keyPress(event)" class="ezUser-text" value="" tabindex="1" id="ezUser-username"/> <label for="ezUser-username" class="ezUser-label">Username:</label> <input type="password" size="40" onkeypress="ezUser_keyPress(event)" class="ezUser-text" onfocus="ezUser_passwordFocus(this)" value="" tabindex="2" id="ezUser-password"/> <label for="ezUser-password" class="ezUser-label">Password:</label> </fieldset> <fieldset class="ezUser-fieldset"> <div onclick="ezUser_click(this)" class="ezUser-message" id="ezUser-message"/> <input type="button" onblur="ezUser_setButtonState(this, 2, false)" onfocus="ezUser_setButtonState(this, 2, true)" onmouseout="ezUser_setButtonState(this, 1, false)" onmouseover="ezUser_setButtonState(this, 1, true)" onclick="ezUser_click(this)" class="ezUser-button ezUser-action ezUser-buttonstate-0" tabindex="4" value="Sign in" id="ezUser-signIn"/> <input type="button" onblur="ezUser_setButtonState(this, 2, false)" onfocus="ezUser_setButtonState(this, 2, true)" onmouseout="ezUser_setButtonState(this, 1, false)" onmouseover="ezUser_setButtonState(this, 1, true)" onclick="ezUser_click(this)" class="ezUser-button ezUser-action ezUser-buttonstate-0" tabindex="3" value="Register" id="ezUser-goaccount"/> </fieldset> <fieldset class="ezUser-fieldset"> <input type="button" onblur="ezUser_setButtonState(this, 2, false)" onfocus="ezUser_setButtonState(this, 2, true)" onmouseout="ezUser_setButtonState(this, 1, false)" onmouseover="ezUser_setButtonState(this, 1, true)" onclick="ezUser_click(this)" class="ezUser-button ezUser-preference ezUser-buttonstate-0" tabindex="7" value="Stay signed in" id="ezUser-staySignedIn"/> <input type="button" onblur="ezUser_setButtonState(this, 2, false)" onfocus="ezUser_setButtonState(this, 2, true)" onmouseout="ezUser_setButtonState(this, 1, false)" onmouseover="ezUser_setButtonState(this, 1, true)" onclick="ezUser_click(this)" class="ezUser-button ezUser-preference ezUser-buttonstate-4" tabindex="6" value="Remember me" id="ezUser-rememberMe"/> <input type="button" onblur="ezUser_setButtonState(this, 2, false)" onfocus="ezUser_setButtonState(this, 2, true)" onmouseout="ezUser_setButtonState(this, 1, false)" onmouseover="ezUser_setButtonState(this, 1, true)" onclick="ezUser_click(this)" class="ezUser-button ezUser-preference ezUser-buttonstate-0" tabindex="5" value="Reset password" id="ezUser-reminder"/> </fieldset> </form>
